content.text: As an enabling solution quad, I want to enhance the workflow to assign the correct assignment group when Tune Database Instance is selected, so that the ticket is correctly assigned.
Acceptance Criteria
Functional Criteria:
Apply the following logic to the workflow in both the “Run Script” action and the “Creat Task” action:
If service == Tune Database Instance and current.variables.specific_or_general_performance_issue == specific_performance_issue
then assignment group =
OPS - DBaaS Support - ITSVC0001019
else continue the normal logic

fields.summary: Enhance the workflow to do the right assignment group for Tune Database Instance

content.text: As a Enabling Solutions Squad Member, I want to add new feature to the workfflow  to have an automatic approval when the Submitteris in the approver listor is the IT service Owner
Acceptance Criteria
Functional Criteria:
-Add a logic to the auto approval block in the wokflow to skip the approval process when the Submitter is in the approver list
-Add a logic to the auto approval block in the wokflow to skip the approval process when the Submitter is The It ServiceOwner
Diagram below contain the logic of auto approval and marked in green the logic that will solve current Jira

fields.summary: Enhance the workflow so that if the submitter is the service owner or approver list  it should automatically approved

content.text: As a enabling solutions squad member, I want to enhance the workflow, so that users can have the knowledge of which forms require approval and which ones don’t.
Acceptance Criteria
Functional Criteria:

Identify in a meeting with Ram and Sid which forms require approval and which one don’t and enhance the variable an UI Policies in Servicenow, so in that way the users know if the need to get the approval or just continue with the form.

fields.summary: Enhance the workflow to only execute an approval process for determined forms

Create Power BI Application for DBaaS Reporting

issuetype.description: Epcis track design and build efforts required to deliver a fully functional feature.
issuetype.name: Feature

issuetype.description: Design Stories track research and prototype effort required to design a feature.
issuetype.name: Enabler Story

content.text: As a Enabling solution Squad member, I want to perform a research about the usage of reports that are available in DBaaS PBI workspace, so that will give us a 360 view of what report are used by the DBaaS customer and  what report could be enhanced.
Acceptance Criteria
Functional Criteria:
Identify the usage metric of the usage of different reports in DBaaS Workspace,
Metrics to be analyze.
Number of  Views in the last 3 month
Number of User that consumed each report in the last 3 month
Average of view by month
Average of user by month
Number of Views at the mid and end of the month
Number of user at the mid and end of the month

fields.summary: Research report usage metric for the different PBI reports in DBaaS Workspace
